ttl.name: WIRELESS DOOR LOCK CONTROL SYSTEM (w/ Theft Deterrent System)

content5.ptxt: In this case, wireless control functions are normal but one ore more of the following may occur.

item.ptxt: The hazard warning light and side turn signal answer-back function is not normal (the theft warning ECU's turn signal flasher output may be malfunctioning).
The security horn answer-back function normal (the security horn signal outpu0t may be malfunction)*.

atten4.ptxt: *: The security horn assembly applies only if the wireless answer-back function has been customized so that the hazard warning lights and side turn signal lights flash and the security horn assembly sounds.

atten3.ptxt: When replacing the theft warning ECU assembly, refer to the registration procedures (See page ).

testgrp.testtitle: CHECK WIRELESS DOOR LOCK CONTROL FUNCTION

test1.ptxt: Check the wireless door lock functions by operating the transmitter switches.

entry.ptxt: Only hazard warning light and side turn signal light answer-back does not occur
Only security horn answer-back does not occur*

atten4.ptxt: *: The security horn assembly applies only if the wireless answer-back function has been customized so that the hazard warning lights and side turn signal lights flash and the security horn assembly sounds.

test1.ptxt: Check that the hazard warning lights and side turn signal lights flash when the hazard warning signal switch assembly is pressed.

specitem.ptxt: Hazard warning lights and side turn signal lights flash when hazard warning signal switch assembly is pressed.

testgrp.testtitle: CHECK HARNESS AND CONNECTOR (THEFT WARNING ECU - TURN SIGNAL FLASHER)

test1.ptxt: Disconnect the T20 theft warning ECU assembly connector.
Disconnect the T13 turn signal flasher assembly connector.
Measure the resistance according to the value(s) in the table below.

testgrp.testtitle: REPAIR OR REPLACE HARNESS OR CONNECTOR
